medium: Artist's multiple; color relief prints on cardboard, offset lithography on paper, cloth over cardboard, wood, ribbon
title: 13 Variations
marks: Signature and Edition on inner spine, in black: [Emmett Williams]
description: black clamshell box containing accordion-folded cardboard with thirteen progressive color relief prints; \"When this you see remember me\" printed in blue, brown, red, green, yellow and orange, doubling the number words on each successive print
creditline: Transfer from the MIA Research and Reference Library; The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund, 1969
